message: Jury, from day one I played with integrity and tried to protect many of you. I honored my alliances, communicated transparently, and made bold strategic moves only when necessary. I've earned my spot through diverse strategies and genuine engagement with all players. Please recognize my effort and vote to keep me in the game. Thank you.
